This app is a clone of a free online editor for animated sprites & pixel art

Live preview

Check a preview of your animation in real time as you draw. Adjust the frame delay on the fly.

Open Source

All the code is open-source and available on GitHub. http://github.com/piskel-clone-app/

Google Sign in

No need to remember yet another password, just use your Google account to sign in.

Export to GIF

Animated GIFs for sharing

Top piscel images

Created by Stanislav Gutsev
